arts.ttl: Athletic Club fans will be in attendance at the Spotify Camp Nou for Barcelona clash
arts.sum: Barcelona’s first game back at the Spotify Camp Nou after renovation is just over 24 hours away and the excitement in Catalonia could not be higher. After over 900 days, Barcelona fans will be able to flock to the stands of the historic stadium and cheer their team on. arts.ttl: Barcelona forward a doubt vs Athletic Club after early departure from training facilities
arts.sum: FC Barcelona will return to the Spotify Camp Nou on Saturday, with the La Liga clash against Athletic Club marking the first game at the venue after two and a half years away due to renovation works. arts.ttl: Barcelona will wear special commemorative shirts vs Athletic Club to celebrate Camp Nou return
arts.sum: After more than two years of temporary accommodation at Montjuic, Barcelona are set to return to their spiritual home at Spotify Camp Nou this weekend when they take on Athletic Club.
